conjunction with the Access and Officers contracts.","events":{"AddOfficer(uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when an officer is added to a case.`caseId` The identifier of the case to which an officer is added.`initiator` The address of the officer initiating the addition.`officer` The address of the officer being added.`caseSpecificOfficerId` The unique identifier for the officer within the case."},"CaseStatusUpdated(uint256,address,uint8,uint8)":{"details":"Emitted when the status of a case is updated.`caseId` The identifier of the case being updated.`initiator` The address of the officer initiating the status update.`oldStatus` The previous status of the case.`newStatus` The new status of the case."},"EIP712DomainChanged()":{"details":"MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed."},"NewCase(uint256,address)":{"details":"Emitted when a new case is created.`caseId` The unique identifier for the new case.`initiator` The address of the officer initiating the case."},"NewEvidenceInCase(uint256,address,uint48,uint8,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"Emitted when new evidence is added to a case.`caseId` The identifier of the case to which evidence is added.`initiator` The address of the officer initiating the addition.`evidenceId` The unique identifier for the evidence in the case.`category` The category of the evidence (e.g., WEAPON, PHYSICAL, DRUG, DOCUMENTARY, etc.).`dataHash` The hash of the evidence's data for data integrity verification.`data` The data associated with the evidence."},"NewParticipantInCase(uint256,address,uint48,uint8,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"Emitted when a new participant is added to a case.`caseId` The identifier of the case to which the SUSPECT, WITNESS, PERPETRATOR, VICTIM).`dataHash` The hash of the participant's data for data integrity verification.`data` The data associated with the participant."},"RemoveOfficer(uint256,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when an officer is removed from a case.`caseId` The identifier of the case from which an officer is addCase(uint256).details: The caller must have the 'CAPTAIN' role to create a case.

params._caseId: The unique identifier for the new case.

addEvidence(uint256,uint256,(uint48,uint.details: The caller must be an officer assigned to the specified case.

params._caseId: The identifier of the case to which evidence is added.
params._caseSpecificOfficerId: The index of the officer within the case.
params._dataHash: The hash of the evidence's data for data integrity verification.

addOfficerInCase(uint256,address).details: The caller must have the 'CAPTAIN' role for the specified case.

params._caseId: The identifier of the case to which an officer is added.
params._officer: The address of the officer to be added.

addParticipant(uint256,uint256,(uint48,u.details: The caller must be an officer assigned to the specified case.

params._caseId: The identifier of the case to which the participant is added.
params._caseSpecificOfficerId: The index of the officer within the case.
params._dataHash: The hash of the participant's data for data integrity verification.

removeOfficerInCase(uint256,uint256,addr.details: The caller must have the 'CAPTAIN' role for the specified case, and the officer must be assigned to the case.

params._caseId: The identifier of the case from which an officer is removed.
params._caseSpecificOfficerId: The index of the officer within the case.
params._officer: The address of the officer to be removed.

updateCaseStatus(uint256,uint8).details: The caller must have the 'CAPTAIN' role for the specified case.

params._caseId: The identifier of the case to be updated.
params._status: The new status of the case.

addOfficerInCase(uint256,address).notice: Adds an officer to a case.

addParticipant(uint256,uint256,(uint48,u.notice: Adds a participant to a case.

removeOfficerInCase(uint256,uint256,addr.notice: Removes an officer from a case.

updateCaseStatus(uint256,uint8).notice: Updates the status of a case.

function (struct Cases.Participant storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Cases.Participant storage ref)
struct Cases.Evidence storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Cases.Evidence storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Cases.Evidence storage ref)
